Context: The WAVE Dental Clinic is accepting registrations for dental clients. New patients need to register for an appointment and can do so online, by email, or phone. Online registration is recommended due to a high volume of calls. The email address for registration is chsclientservices@georgebrown.ca, and the phone number is (416) 415-4547. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, all attendees must have a confirmed appointment and pass a COVID-19 screening process prior to each appointment. The WAVE Dental Clinic offers dental services such as cleanings, restorations, dentures, and teeth whitening. Students from the School of Dental Health provide these services while being supervised by faculty. The WAVE Hearing Clinic's services are currently not available due to Public Health requirements. For more information, visit the college's land acknowledgment and sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more at ask.george@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). The information on the website is subject to change without notice.
